summary: Demo of Glorious Terrain\'s lengthy project. This is a extensive WIP of the Dragonborn Terrain includes what I feel is a more Immersive atmosphere of Red Mountains destruction of Solstheim.  Requires Dragonborn and Latest Version of Skyrim. Many Thank for those who support this mod in development.
descriptionHtml:
[FONT=Impact][size=18][color=#FFEBCD]Glorious Terrain[/size][/FONT][/color]
---------------------
[size=12][color=#FFEBCD]Demo[/size][/color]
[color=#FFEBCD]
The demo is to share what WIP I\'m working on for Solstheim. Try it out and I will see what response I get from this to continue the work. This project requires great time and dedication. This small demo will present a very detail portion of the Raven Rock. 
===================================================================

Features: 

- Hand placed foliage,damaged trees and placed with love. 
- Expresses the impact that Red Mountain had on Solstheim
- More dense grass and terrain features done with great detail. 
===========================================================


I encourage people to try it out and please leave feedback. This is only a small portion but it is a very time consuming project and would like to see if others are interested before I spend more time on this project. 

==========================================================[/color]
author: EMT2010
